description: React component implementing a comprehensive SOW (Statement of Work) data collection form, including fields for project metadata, background, scope, deliverables, roles, approach, governance, commercials, legal, and sign-off, with features like logo upload, dynamic list management, and structured data handling.

methods.name: Section({ title, children })
methods.description: Helper component for rendering a titled section with children content.

methods.name: Input({ label, value, onChange, type = "text", placeholder })
methods.description: Reusable input field component with label, supporting different input types.

methods.name: Field({ label, value, onChange })
methods.description: Textarea field with label, for multi-line text input.

methods.name: ListField({ title, path, items, onAdd, onRemove })
methods.description: Component for managing and displaying a list of items with add/remove features.

methods.name: getPath(obj, path)
methods.description: Utility to retrieve nested property value from an object given a path array.

methods.name: setPath(obj, path, value)
methods.description: Utility to set a nested property value within an object based on a path array.

methods.name: splitCsv(s)
methods.description: Utility to split a comma-separated string into an array of trimmed, non-empty strings.

ctags.name: Input
ctags.pattern: /^function Input({ label, value, onChange, type = "text", placeholder }) {$/

ctags.name: ListField
ctags.pattern: /^function ListField({ title, path, items, onAdd, onRemove }) {$/
